actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit certain misuses of the Social Security account number.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit: (1) using social security account numbers without the holder's written consent; or (2) requiring disclosure by another person of a person's social security number as a condition of doing business. Outlines enforcement procedures and provides civil penalties.

titles.title: To amend part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit certain misuses of the Social Security account number.
